item.rpgmod.grimoire_hourglass.tooltip: §7An ancient tome containing magic of sand and time.§r
spell.rpgmod.eroding_shot.desc: §7Fires a projectile that deals §bmagic damage§7 and §eslows§7 the target.§r
spell.rpgmod.sand_squall.desc: §7Creates a cone of sharp sand, hitting multiple targets in front of you.§r
spell.rpgmod.stasis_field.desc: §7Freezes time in an area around you, nearly stopping all enemies.§r
spell.rpgmod.quicksand_trap.desc: §7Creates a quicksand trap on the ground that immobilizes and weakens enemies.§r
spell.rpgmod.dune_shift.desc: §7A quick dash forward, allowing you to dodge attacks.§r
spell.rpgmod.sandstorm_aegis.desc: §7Ultimate: Surrounds you with a protective vortex that reduces damage and hurts nearby enemies.§r
